title: Covid: French uproar as Macron vows to 'piss off' unvaccinated
content:
1. Covid: French uproar as Macron vows to 'piss off' unvaccinated  BBC News
  2. Macron Under Fire for Vowing to Make Unvaccinated Miserable  The New York Times
  3. French opposition MPs criticised after Covid vaccine pass debate suspended  The Guardian
  4. Macron’s language about the unvaccinated provokes a storm in France  NBC News
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
